nodes.text: Star Wars: R2-D2 Deluxe Book and Model Set

Star Wars: R2-D2 Deluxe Book and Model Set is an R2-D2 model kit published by Insight Editions as part of their IncrediBuilds collection. The kit includes a laser-cut, FSC-certified wood sheet, step-by-step instructions, coloring and crafting ideas, and an R2-D2 guidebook, titled An Inside Look At The Ultimate Astromech Droid, written by Michael Kogge. It was released on August 2, 2016.

An updated version of the book and model set was released in 2017. R2-D2: Collector's Edition Book and Model included a new, larger model and an expanded 48-page edition of the guidebook, featuring 16 pages of exclusive new content. The larger model, which has 297 pieces compared to 81 of the original model, stands 18 inches tall and has a moveable, rotating head.
